name: Jigtris Puzzle
description:
Solve your favourite jigsaw puzzles on the go! Jigtris Jigsaw Puzzles provides an unbeatable puzzle solving experience for puzzle lovers of all ages.

It's the puzzle solving joy we all know and love!

FEATURES:
- Beautifully easy: Natural interface that is simple and easy to use
- Increasing difficulty: Solving puzzles from 4 all the way up to 225 (on 7''-10'' tablets) pieces!
- Kids mode: Guiding lines and 'magnetic' piece locking for smaller puzzles
- Hundreds of images: Grouped in themes or customise by using your own photos
